sense.def:
An auction
je javna prodaja predmetov osebam, ki ponudijo najvišjo ceno.

seg.quote: The big house was sold by auction.

sense.def:
To auction something
pomeni nekaj prodati na dražbi.

cit.quote: licitirati, ponuditi v prodajo na dražbi

seg.quote: They are going to auction the pictures at the end of the month.

sense.def:
To auction off a number of things
pomeni, da se vrste predmetov znebimo s prodajo na dražbi.
